event-type.name: Chat user auto strict
event-type.text: %0 automatically moved to strict credit mode

event-type.name: Chat user monitor created
event-type.text: %0 created %1 with name %2, place %3, gender %4, orient %5 and info %6

event-type.name: Chat user info admin
event-type.text: %0 changed info for %1 from %2 to %3 for reason %4

event-type.name: Chat user info cleared
event-type.text: %0 clared info for %1, was %2, for reason %3

event-type.name: Chat user prefs
event-type.text: %0 set prefs for %1 to gender %2 and orient %3

event-type.name: Chat user credit mode
event-type.text: %0 changed credit mode for %1 from %2 to %3

event-type.name: Chat user location API
event-type.text: Location for %0 set to (%1,%2) via API

event-type.name: Chat user place API
event-type.text: Location for %0 set to %1 (%2,%3) by API
